info.name: 4chan - Black like your soul
info.description:
-- Deprecated --
This style no longer works with the new 4chan layout and I have no intention of updating it. There are plenty of better styles out now anyway.
info.additionalInfo:
-- Deprecated --
This style no longer works with the new 4chan layout and I have no intention of updating it. There are plenty of better styles out now anyway.

The screenshot uses a font called VL PGothic that you most likely won't have. I'll try adding it in with @font-face soon. (Doesn't look like it's possible for now).

Things that I know are bad but probably won't (can't) fix:
- Greentext'd spoilers appear unspoileringly green and don't have the hover thing work properly.


2010/06/24 - A deleted image in OP post has a "File Deleted" png with black text. It's invisible because the background is also black. I hid the image.
2010/07/05 - Hid those new ads that even ABP isn't blocking
2011/01/04:
- Spoilers have []'s around them now. I can't change the colours, so this will have to do. You should be able to tell where spoilers exist in OP posts now. Greentext'd spoilers are made visible. It's a bug or something, and I can't do shit about it.
- Added chrome support for some features, I'll do the rest eventually.
- Board names are visible again.
- Line spacing and padding/margins are reduced, so you can see more text. This might bother some people. You'll get used to it.
- Less obnoxious border radii
- Other things I have forgotten about

Screenshot: http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/4025/jpscreenshot.png

(I'm keeping this old screenshot around because it is glorious: http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/6720/uploadthis.png)
